mapper.insert: insert into t_memberinfo (mem_ID, mem_Type_ID, mem_Name, mem_User_Name, mem_Password, mem_Tel, mem_Phone, mem_Address, mem_Gender, mem_Money, mem_Integral, mem_Birthday, mem_Begin_Time, mem_End_Time, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy) values (#{memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memGender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{memMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{memBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_memberinfo set mem_Type_ID = #{memTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_Name = #{memName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_User_Name = #{memUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_Password = #{memPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_Tel = #{memTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_Phone = #{memPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_Address = #{memAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_Gender = #{memGender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, mem_Money = #{memMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mem_Integral = #{memIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_Birthday = #{memBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, mem_Begin_Time = #{memBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mem_End_Time = #{memEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_SubTime = #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where mem_ID = #{memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mem_ID, mem_Type_ID, mem_Name, mem_User_Name, mem_Password, mem_Tel, mem_Phone, mem_Address, mem_Gender, mem_Money, mem_Integral, mem_Birthday, mem_Begin_Time, mem_End_Time, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_memberinfo where mem_ID = #{memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
